attributes.action: Support the Newbrough Multi Use Games Area and Children's Foundation Play Area Planning Application
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in rural Northumberland whilst it is a beautiful place to live it is very isolated with not a lot to do.  Last year with the help of The People Millions we got over 5,600 votes to win £50k along with other substantail funds we now have enough to install the Multi Use Games Aarea and Children's Foundation Area - However our planning application has been deferred until a site visit can be made - the deffering of the project may in fact halt the project as we are on a tight time schedule and may lose the funding.  It would be a shame to lose this fantastic opportunity for our children
